lines.text: Why didn't you tell me I was in love with you?

[when Harry Palmer first appears]
Say, *he* looks like an actor.
Aren't you a little out of season?
Gee what do you do when you love somebody so much, and they don't even know you're around?
I dunno Jo. I guess you just keep right on loving them.

[after he and Jo kiss for the first time]
Say, what hit us?
You'll never be big time because you're small time in your heart.
Chicago, Boston, Detroit, they're all the same, except New York... that is a city!
Who's the want ad with the squirrel around his neck?
But I'm sorry you love him so much.
You know what's been the matter with you? You've been walking around with a picture book villain in your pocket and every once in a while you take a look at it like it was a mirror.
He's wrong and I love him. He's right and I love him
He's an opportunist - an egotistical actor who would do anything to get what he wants.
You think anything's going to stand in the way of us playing the Palace this time? Oh no, not even a war.
